Works perfectly with all resource packs, and realms servers. Only downside is customised skins don't appear to load both for me and others - but that's likely something at the game's end as it's iffy with those anyway.
I was surprised, but very little effort to make this work. Sign in to your Google Play account, then eventually link to Microsoft account, and you're up an running. Cool!

Firstly, I've used this launcher many times , always an easy experience. Today I tried to install it ,worked fine , but when I runned it, it didn't render my skin in the main menu , and when I enter a world or a server it crashes. Looking at the error I figured out it was something related to the hybris 3d graphics , since I had already gotten that error before and installing hybris related packages fixed it , I when to try and install hybris packages , but there's no way , mesa-hybris is missing , and all the other packages use wayland.... 

Any help is apreciated, happy christmas.

The only appeal of Bedrock for many people is in cross-platform multiplayer. Currently this project is abandoned and not being updated to support the latest Minecraft updates. It still lets you play older versions of Bedrock, but older versions can't do crossplay with versions 19+, which means I might as well play the latest Java version by myself with mod support than play an outdated version of Bedrock by myself.
I love it but the textures are really broken and stuff. I would love if there was a button or something you can click or and import button for mods and maps but overall great.
This project works perfectly but it might be a bit unstable. Some users might run into some issues though.
summary: Works perfectly, might be a bit unstable

Davon abgesehen läuft es jedoch erstaunlich gut.

Voilà un bon moyen d'acceder à votre jeu cubique préféré. 
Attention toute fois sur certains points. 
1- Les mise à jour de Mojang, arrive après quelques jours. 
2- Il persiste encore quelques bugs
3- Il vous faut OBLIGATOIREMENT un compte Minecraft sur le google play

Sinon, super apt. Rappelons que Minecraft PE n'est pas pour linux de base, et que ce travail est super. Merci au dev. 

De plus un site vous permet de vous tenir au courant des MAJ de l'apt etc...
